definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The Formosan landlocked salmon is the only salmon to live in a subtropical region.
sentences.chinese: 台湾的樱花钩吻鲑是唯一生活在亚热带的鲑鱼。

sentences.english: I read from a book that the climate in New Orleans is semitropical.
sentences.chinese: 我看过一本书说新奥尔良属于亚热带气候。

sentences.english: The sub-tropical period was also caused by a significant amount of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 亚热带的时期也因明显的大气中，碳排放量所影响。

sentences.english: For " rare some is mutiple level on the world monsoon sex is semi-tropical primitive rain forest ".
sentences.chinese: 为“世界上稀有的多层次季风性亚热带原始雨林”。

sentences.english: The paleoclimate should belong to the subtropical one.
sentences.chinese: 古气候应属亚热带气候。

sentences.english: These sharks occur in all tropical and subtropical ocean regions around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 在热带和亚热带海域都能发现它们的身影。

sentences.english: Castanopsis hystrix is one of the important planting tree species of south subtropical evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 红锥是南亚热带地区优良的珍贵乡土阔叶造林树种。

sentences.english: Wuyi Mountains preserve the primary forest ecosystem characteristic of the mid-subtropics.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山保存了典型的中亚热带原生性森林生态系统。

sentences.english: Mike: Taiwan's subtropical climate is perfect for cultivating all kinds of fruit and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 台湾的亚热带气候适合种植任何水果和蔬菜。

sentences.english: L.A. has a favorable subtropical climate with many white sand beaches.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶有着宜人的亚热带气候以及许多白沙滩。
它是亚热带温润季风气候。

sentences.english: Bischofia javanica Bl. is a main plant in the tropical and subtropical evergreen monsoon forest.
sentences.chinese: 秋枫为热带和亚热带常绿季雨林中的主要树种。

sentences.english: It distincts four seasons and moderate climate due to the influence from monsoon circulation.
sentences.chinese: 属亚热带湿润气候区，四季分明，气候温和。

sentences.english: The developmental prospect apple varieties in the tropics and subtropics is forecasted.
sentences.chinese: 最后展望了苹果在热带亚热带的发展前景。

sentences.english: Under the natural conditions, the central subtropical zone of China is impossible to be desertified.
sentences.chinese: 我国中亚热带在自然条件下不会荒漠化。

sentences.english: Barracudas occur in subtropical and tropical oceans worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 梭鱼分布于全球各地的热带和亚热带海域。

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2

definition: Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
